span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}
.sidebar_section_col h3, .sidebar_section_col2 h3, .sidebar_section_col div {
    font-size: 20px;
    color: #fff;
    background: #061b30;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto';
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    color: #000;
    padding: 6px 10px;
    display: block;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {
    padding-right: 5px;
    color: #c00100;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg {
    background: #f1f3f2;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li.morepkg a {
    color: #c00100;
    text-align: right;
    font-weight: bold;
}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;
    list-style: none;
    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {
    font-weight: bold;
}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}
.tour-collection .table-responsive {
    min-height: .01%;
    overflow-x: auto;
}
.tour-collection table {
    width: 100%;
    background: #9e9e9e54;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table tr {
    background-color: #fef2b8;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table th {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    padding-top: 6px !important;
    padding-bottom: 6px !important;
    background-color: #061b30;
    border: none !important;
}
.tour-collection .table-newbg table td {
    padding-top: 5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 5px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none !important;
	font-family: 'Roboto';
	font-weight: bold;
}

.pkg-inc ul li,.pkg-exc ul li {
    padding: 7px 0px 7px 22px !important;
    list-style: none;
    background: url(/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/inc.jpg) no-repeat left;
}

.pkg-inc ul li:before,.pkg-exc ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.pkg-exc ul li {

}

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/thailand-tour-packages" title="Thailand Tour Packages">Thailand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c378fa1ecd8_34422008" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/bangkok-pattaya.jpg" alt="Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package" title="Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Browse our meticulously designed 5 Nights and 6 Days long Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package and get ready to feel lost in the pictorial landscapes of Thailand. The package offers you the opportunity to explore all the tourist destinations located in and around Pattaya and Bangkok including Nong Nooch Village in Pattaya, Koh Larn Coral Island, and many more. Spending some quality time with your loved ones amidst the serene and tranquil ambiance of the surroundings, exploring the white glimmering beaches, indulging in various water sport activities are some other things which can make it a lifelong memorable trip.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Bangkok Pattaya Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival at Bangkok Airport</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon your arrival at Bangkok Airport, you will be received by our tour representative. The representative will then take you to Pattaya straight from the airport. Enjoy the scenic beauty throughout the road journey and on reaching the desired destination you will be transferred to one of your pre-decided hotels. Complete the check-in formalities and then loosen up yourself in the hotel room. There is no proper schedule for the day so enjoy relaxing in the cozy hotel environment Later at night, you will be served with delicious Thai cuisine in a dinner which will then be followed by a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Pattaya – Koh Larn Coral Island</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After gorging upon the delectable morning meal, you will drive towards Koh Larn Coral Island tour via a speedboat. Enjoy the heart throbbing and the Breathtaking Splendors at the island and then indulge yourself in various water sport activities like scuba diving, Snorkeling, parasailing, and then spend some relaxing and peaceful moments along the beachside. Later in the afternoon, you can treat your Taste Buds with mouth-watering cuisines at lunch. After a fun-filled day, you will be dropped back at the hotel in Pattaya and have a sound sleep.</p>
<p><strong>Note:</strong> You will have to pay an additional cost for the water sport activities as it is not included in the package.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Pattaya – Nong Nooch Village</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Give a beautiful and healthy start to your third day of the trip with a hearty breakfast and then get ready to visit the other iconic attraction of Pattaya i.e. Nong Nooch Village. The village is one of the most gorgeous and happening tourist attractions in the city as the site is adorned with colourful and scented flower gardens which is spread over a huge area of 500 acres. Waterfalls, orchid nurseries, and pristine lakes are the features that define the beauty of this village. Try some local cuisines of this village which not only satisfy your hunger needs but also treats your taste buds in a different and appealing way. On your visit to this village, you can also witness sword fighting, elephant shows, Thai boxing, and folk dances to add more charm to this visit. If time permits you then stroll down the areas in and around the city.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Bangkok – Temple Tour in the city</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post enjoying the lavish breakfast at the hotel in Pattaya, make your baggage ready as this is the time to move towards the capital city of Thailand. Complete the check-out formalities at the hotel and then drive towards Bangkok and on reaching the capital city, you will be transferred to the hotel where you can relax for a few hours. After a few hours of relaxation, get ready for the temple tour as the city boasts several temples and so the day is scheduled accordingly. You will be visiting Wat Pho- The Temple of Reclining Buddha and also the Wat Traimit – The temple of Golden Buddha as these are the most famous temples in Thailand. After the completion of a spiritual tour, serve yourself with the delicious lunch and then spend your time in leisure. If time allows you then indulge yourself in spa massage treatment for what Thailand is popular all across the globe or you can also head towards the place which is popular for nightlife.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Bangkok – Exploring the Safari World</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post enjoying the scrumptious breakfast at the hotel, you will be transferred to the Safari World where you can enjoy 4 varied sections of shows at four different regions amongst which Marine Park is the most important one where you can enjoy sea lion show, dolphin, show, and two more. Later in the evening, visit the local markets where you can buy the special items of the destination at reasonable rates. Once you are done with your shopping then you will be transferred to the hotel for dinner and as you must be tired by now so go for a relaxing overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Departure from Bangkok</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>This is the final day of your journey which you will start with a hearty breakfast. Post Savoring the breakfast check-out from the hotel and then drive towards the airport to board the flight for your onward journey towards home. We hope you had a great time in Thailand.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Bangkok Pattaya Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Bangkok Pattaya So Well-Known?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Pattaya is a popular beach resort on the Gulf of Thailand, located just 150 kilometres southeast of Bangkok, a two-hour drive away. The vibrant nightlife of Pattaya is well known, but in recent years, local authorities have improved the quality of the beaches and reinvented the resort as a more family-friendly destination.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Area Of Pattaya Is The Best To Stay In?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Walking Street is the best place to stay in Pattaya, especially if you want to experience the best nightlife in town. This entertainment district, located in Pattaya South, has the most pubs, bars, restaurants, and places to stay.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Pattaya?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> From November to February Pattaya is best visited between November and February, when the weather is neither too hot nor too cold and is mostly pleasant. This is also peak tourist season, so most beaches and other tourist attractions are crowded.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Why Is Bangkok So Well-Known For Tourism?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Bangkok attracts millions of tourists for good reason: the city is famous for its food scene, vibrant nightlife, and shopping districts. Uma Puacksumran, a former flight attendant from Bangkok, has visited fifty countries on five continents.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Is Bangkok's Speciality?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The city is well-known for its street life, cultural landmarks, and red-light districts. The Grand Palace and Buddhist temples such as Wat Arun and Wat Pho contrast with other tourist attractions such as Khaosan Road and Patpong's nightlife scenes.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>

excerpt.rendered: Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package Home » International » Thailand » Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package Tour Overview Browse our meticulously designed 5 Nights and 6 Days long Bangkok Pattaya Tour Package and get ready to feel lost in the pictorial landscapes of Thailand. The package offers you the opportunity to explore all the tourist destinations located...
